channel.title: Project Guardian
channel.description:
Okay, its Danny here and im planning on making a new type a server and i going to need some help here. Now ive made a couple servers before and i would rate my recent one 3.5 stars, but this one needs to be 5 stars.
[b]Server Type[/b]: 317/474 [b]Server Summary[/b]: I am looking to make this server a mixture of PK and Skilling. Now this server will be not just like any other delta or dodian, it will be a new type of server. Im thinking of making it run on 474 cache. _____________________________________________________________________________ [b]Positions[/b]
[b]Idea Managers[/b]: These people will be in charge of giving us ideas. They will think of idea's and tell us what should be added and what should be modified or changed.
[b]Server Coders[/b]: These people will be in charge of what goes in the server. They are crucial to this project. We are looking for some experienced coders.
[b]Client Coders[/b]: These people are in charge of creating the client. This also is a crucial part of this project. [b]Webclient Coders[/b]: These people will design the webclient once the main client is created. [b]Map Cache Coders[/b]: These people will import the map cache into the client for godwars & etc. [b]Model Designer[/b]: This person will create and add new items into the game. [b]Skillcapes[/b]: This person will add working skillcape emotes with correct timing into the game
[b]Beta Testers[/b]: These group of people will test the finished result of the client & server and give feedback
[b]MySQL Guru's[/b]: These people will help with highscores and possibly create integration with phpbb or smf
[b]Website Designers:[/b] These people will help us build the website.
[b]Server Hoster[/b]: This person will host the server[this will change once we configure the vps] ________________________________________________________________ [b]More Information[/b]
I have enough money to buy the domain, and i have unlimited webhosting for the website. My postions will be everything above. I also have enough money to buy a 1gb vps for one month. _________________________________________________________________ [b]Required Things[/b] Godswords With Working 100% stance and gfx Skillcapes With Working 100% emotes Jad will all levels. Skills to be scattered around. _____________________________________________________________________________ [b]Format[/b]
Name: Age: Position: Experience: Summary About Yourself:
also feel free to contact me at dannyman231@hotmail.com __________________________________________________________________________ [b]MISC[/b]
I have everything to get a community off and running now we just need the server and client. Also all donations will go to server coders. __________________________________________________________________________ [b]Current Coders[/b]:
dannydude8 - [u]Website Designer,Server Designer,Project Manager[/u] ___________________________________________________________________________ [b]Project InsanityPK Progress[/b] [img]http://insanityhosting.com/paypal.JPG[/img]

item.title: Project Guardian
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

Okay, its Danny here and im planning on making a new type a server and i going to need some help here. Now ive made a couple servers before and i would rate my recent one 3.5 stars, but this one needs to be 5 stars.

Server Type: 317/474
Server Summary: I am looking to make this server a mixture of PK and Skilling. Now this server will be not just like any other delta or dodian, it will be a new type of server. Im thinking of making it run on 474 cache.

Positions

Idea Managers: These people will be in charge of giving us ideas. They will think of idea’s and tell us what should be added and what should be modified or changed.

Server Coders: These people will be in charge of what goes in the server. They are crucial to this project. We are looking for some experienced coders.

Client Coders: These people are in charge of creating the client. This also is a crucial part of this project.
Webclient Coders: These people will design the webclient once the main client is created.
Map Cache Coders: These people will import the map cache into the client for godwars & etc.
Model Designer: This person will create and add new items into the game.
Skillcapes: This person will add working skillcape emotes with correct timing into the game

Beta Testers: These group of people will test the finished result of the client & server and give feedback

MySQL Guru’s: These people will help with highscores and possibly create integration with phpbb or smf

Website Designers: These people will help us build the website.

Server Hoster: This person will host the server[this will change once we configure the vps]

More Information

I have enough money to buy the domain, and i have unlimited webhosting for the website. My postions will be everything above. I also have enough money to buy a 1gb vps for one month.

Required Things
Godswords With Working 100% stance and gfx
Skillcapes With Working 100% emotes
Jad will all levels.
Skills to be scattered around.

Format

Name:
Age:
Position:
Experience:
Summary About Yourself:

also feel free to contact me at dannyman231@hotmail.com

MISC

I have everything to get a community off and running now we just need the server and client. Also all donations will go to server coders.

Current Coders:

dannydude8 - Website Designer,Server Designer,Project Manager

Project InsanityPK Progress
